name: cough drops
description: Medicated lozenges that dissolve slowly in the mouth to soothe throat irritation and suppress coughing. Contains ingredients like menthol or eucalyptus for temporary relief.

name: honey tea
description: Warm tea with honey that provides soothing relief for throat irritation and cough. The honey coats the throat while the warmth helps reduce inflammation and provides comfort.

name: ibuprofen
description: Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that reduces pain, inflammation, and fever. Effective for headaches, muscle pain, and general discomfort. Take with food to reduce stomach irritation.

name: heating pad
description: Electric or microwaveable pad that provides targeted heat therapy to relieve muscle tension and pain. Apply for 15-20 minutes at a time to affected areas for comfort and relaxation.

name: prescription antibiotics
description: Medication prescribed by a healthcare provider to treat bacterial infections. Must be taken exactly as directed and completed fully, even if symptoms improve before finishing the course.

name: antiseptic ointment
description: Topical medication that prevents infection in minor cuts, scrapes, and sores. Contains antibacterial ingredients to keep wounds clean and promote healing while preventing bacterial growth.

name: hydrocortisone cream
description: Topical corticosteroid that reduces inflammation, itching, and redness of the skin. Effective for treating rashes, eczema, and other skin irritations. Use sparingly and as directed.

name: antihistamine
description: Medication that blocks histamine receptors to reduce allergic reactions, itching, and inflammation. Helpful for treating rashes caused by allergies or environmental irritants.

name: fiber supplement
description: Dietary supplement that adds bulk to stool and promotes regular bowel movements. Helps relieve constipation by improving digestive health. Take with plenty of water for best results.

name: contact your doctor
description: Seek immediate professional medical evaluation when symptoms are severe, persistent, or concerning. Healthcare providers can diagnose underlying conditions and prescribe appropriate treatment plans.

name: multivitamin supplement
description: Daily vitamin and mineral supplement to address potential nutritional deficiencies that may contribute to weakness. Contains essential vitamins and minerals to support energy metabolism and overall health.

name: iron supplement
description: Supplement to address iron deficiency anemia, a common cause of weakness and fatigue. Take with vitamin C to enhance absorption and avoid with dairy products or calcium supplements.

name: rest and hydration
description: Adequate sleep (7-9 hours) and proper hydration to support body recovery and energy levels. Dehydration and sleep deprivation are common reversible causes of weakness and fatigue.

name: light exercise
description: Gentle physical activity like walking or stretching to improve circulation and energy levels. Start slowly and gradually increase activity as tolerated to build strength and endurance.

name: urgent medical consultation
description: Seek prompt medical attention for concerning symptoms that may require immediate evaluation. Contact your healthcare provider or visit urgent care for symptoms that are worsening or persistent.
